#summary Wolfram Cellular Automata With Squaring Rules.
#labels Featured

= Introduction =

Squaring Rule from Wolfram's New Kind of Science, given an input N, after so many iterations N^2 will appear.   

This is an example of emergent behavior forming from a simple set of input rules.

Also see:
http://mathworld.wolfram.com/CellularAutomaton.html
